warnings.warning1: Notice: your Buy and Sell orders overlap
warnings.warning2: Notice, you offer to buy {{token}} above current market price
warnings.warning3: Notice, you offer to sell {{token}} below current market price

errors.error1: Max Price must be higher than min price and not zero

tooltips.tooltip1:
This section will define the order details in which you are willing to buy {{token}} at.
Limit will allow you to define a specific price point to buy the token at.
Range will allow you to define a range of prices to buy the token at.
tooltips.tooltip2:
This section will define the order details in which you are willing to sell {{token}} at.
Limit will allow you to define a specific price point to sell the token at.
Range will allow you to define a range of prices to sell the token at.

deleteStrategy.title: Are you sure you would like to delete your strategy?

contents.content1: All data on the strategy will be deleted. It will be impossible to restore them.
contents.content2: All funds will be withdrawn to your wallet

pauseStrategy.title: Are you sure you would like to pause your strategy?
pauseStrategy.content: This will prevent your strategy from being traded against, however you will retain access to any associated funds.

contents.content2: Unfortunately we couldn't find a token for the address you entered, try to <bold>import a new token.</bold>
contents.content3: Unfortunately we couldn't find the token you're looking for, try searching for it <bold>by address.</bold>

selectTokenPair.error1: Error: Unable to load token list

connectWallet.content1: By connecting my wallet, I agree to the <1>terms & conditions</1> and <2>cookie & privacy policy</2> of this site.

contents.content1: Before updating {{token}} allowance, you are required to revoke it to 0.

tradeRouting.tooltip1: When managing the list of orders, your trade amounts will change to reflect these changes.

contents.content1: Error: No token found for this address

descriptions.description1: You rejected the transaction. If this was by mistake, please try again.
descriptions.description2: You are approving {{token}} for spending on the protocol.
descriptions.description3: You have successfully approved {{token}} for limited spending on the protocol.
descriptions.description4: You have successfully approved {{token}} for unlimited spending on the protocol.
descriptions.description8: Your previous approval was successfully revoked.
descriptions.description10: Approval for {{token}} has failed. Please try again or contact support.
descriptions.description14: Your request to pause the strategy is being processed.
descriptions.description16: Your request to pause your strategy has failed.
descriptions.description17: Your request to renew the strategy is being processed.
descriptions.description18: Your request to renew the strategy was successfully completed.
descriptions.description19: Your request to renew the strategy has failed.
descriptions.description23: Your withdraw request is being processed.
descriptions.description24: Your withdraw request was successfully completed.
descriptions.description26: Your deposit request is being processed.
descriptions.description27: Your deposit request was successfully completed.
descriptions.description30: Strategy was successfully deleted and all associated funds have been withdrawn to your wallet.
descriptions.description32: Your edit request is being processed.

noStrategyCard.title: Automate your Trading Strategies
noStrategyCard.subtitle: A fully decentralized protocol for automating on-chain trading strategies.

notification.title: Strategy Notification
notification.content1: You can set a notification to be informed each time someone trades against your strategy.
notification.content2: This is a third-party service managed by <strong>hal.xyz<strong>

tooltips.tooltip1: This section indicates the details to which you are willing to buy {{token}} at. When a trader interact with your buy order, it will fill up your 'Sell' order with tokens.
tooltips.tooltip2: This section indicates the details to which you are willing to sell {{token}} at. When a trader interact with your sell order, it will fill up your 'Buy' order with tokens.
tooltips.tooltip3: This is the price in which you are willing to buy {{token}}.
tooltips.tooltip4: This is the price in which you are willing to sell {{token}}.
tooltips.tooltip5: This is the available amount of {{sellToken}} tokens that you are willing to use in order to buy {{buyToken}}.
tooltips.tooltip6: This is the available amount of {{token}} tokens that you are willing to sell.
tooltips.tooltip7: Your strategy is active and ready
tooltips.tooltip8: Your strategy has no associated funds. Consider depositing funds to activate it.
tooltips.tooltip9: Your strategy is currently paused. Edit the prices to activate it.
tooltips.tooltip10: Your strategy is currently inactive. Consider activating it with funds and rates.

contents.content2: Tokens acquired in a buy order become automatically available to trade in the linked sell order, and vice versa.
An irreversible buy or sell order at a predefined price or range.

tooltips.tooltip1: Select the Base token for the pair
tooltips.tooltip2: Select the Quote token for the pair (i.e. when selecting USDC, all rates would be denominated in USDC)
tooltips.tooltip3:
Selecting the tokens you would like to create a strategy for.
Buy or Sell token (also called Base token) is the token you would like to buy or sell in the strategy.
With token (also called Quote token) is the token you would denominate the rates in.

tooltips.tooltip1: This section will define the order details in which you are willing to buy {{token}} at.
tooltips.tooltip2: This section will define the order details in which you are willing to sell {{token}} at.
tooltips.tooltip3: Define the price you are willing to buy {{buyToken}} at. Make sure the price is in {{sellToken}} tokens.
tooltips.tooltip4: Define the price you are willing to sell {{buyToken}} at. Make sure the price is in {{sellToken}} tokens.
tooltips.tooltip5: Note: this amount will re-fill once the 'Sell' order is used by traders.
tooltips.tooltip6: The amount of {{sellToken}} tokens you would like to use in order to buy {{buyToken}}. {{note}}
tooltips.tooltip7: Note: this amount will re-fill once the 'Buy' order is used by traders.
tooltips.tooltip8: The amount of {{buyToken}} tokens you would like to sell. {{note}}

contents.content7: The budget is allocated to the entire newly set range and the asking price is updated.
contents.content10: Price remains the same as it was. The budget is not allocated to the new range.
contents.content11: Strategy budget will be distribute across entire range

tooltips.tooltip1: Indicate the amount you wish to withdraw from the available 'allocated budget'
tooltips.tooltip2: Indicate the amount you wish to deposit from the available 'allocated budget'
tooltips.tooltip3: When updating the rates, the allocated budget will be distributed equally across the entire range
tooltips.tooltip4: This is the current available {{token}} budget you can withdraw

errors.error8: No available orders at this moment.
